page.title: 10 RECREATION IN RIPPINGALE
page.content: From a survey of 65 households the following information was gained:{The {four most popular activities are {reading,sports,visiting parks and {cinemas.}Sports included tennis, cricket and swimming.The most common hobbies are gardening,reading,sewing, walking and knitting. Many activities are home based,e,g;wine-making and do-it-yourself.{Although T.V.is very {common,only 8% of those surveyed {deemed it worth a mention.}The village hall is used for many group activities (see page 9)Interests in community work,horses and visiting the pub were also expressed.Regarding{holidays;}50% of the sample took an annual holiday in Britain,20% went abroad,25% stayed at home and the remainder visited relatives.It would appear,from these results,that{there is a wide usage of {our increased leisure time.
